name: Chapter 4: The Warning
short_description: Data works relentlessly to decode the hidden message and manages to uncover a dire warning about an impending cosmic event. Captain Picard faces the challenge of gaining the Codarians' trust to act on this warning.
from_prev_chapter: Data deciphers part of the hidden message.
to_next_chapter: The crew needs to convince the Codarians to work with them to prevent the cosmic event.
